GSD.product_version: versions from v5.0 to before v5.10.155
GSD.description:
tipc: fix the msg->req tlv len check in tipc_nl_compat_name_table_dump_header

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.155 by commit f31dd158580940938f77514b87337a777520185a, it was introduced in version v5.0 by commit 974cb0e3e7c963ced06c4e32c5b2884173fa5e01. For more details please see the references link.
